changeSet.author: Sigma
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ArgusUser( user_id INT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('userID_seq'), profilePhoto TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'data:image/jpeg;base64,', fname TEXT NOT NULL, lname TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL, userPass TEXT NOT NULL, userRole TEXT NOT NULL, notifyEmail BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true, notifyLocal BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true, userDeleted DATE, PRIMARY KEY (user_id) );

CREATE TABLE Notification( notification_id INT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('notificationID_seq'), image TEXT NOT NULL, listed TEXT NOT NULL, msg TEXT NOT NULL, onDate DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, atTime TIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIME, notificationDeleted DATE, user_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES ArgusUser(user_id), PRIMARY KEY (notification_id) );

CREATE TABLE Person( person_id INT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('personID_seq'), image TEXT NOT NULL, fname TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Unknown', lname TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Unknown', personListed TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Grey', personCreated DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, personDeleted DATE, PRIMARY KEY (person_id) );

CREATE TABLE Vehicle( vehicle_id INT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('vehicleID_seq'), image TEXT NOT NULL, vehicleListed TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Grey', licenseNo TEXT NOT NULL, vehicleCreated DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, vehicleDeleted DATE, person_id INT REFERENCES Person(person_id), PRIMARY KEY (vehicle_id) );
CREATE TABLE Face( face_id INT NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('faceID_seq'), person_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES Person(person_id), features TEXT NOT NULL, faceDeleted DATE, PRIMARY KEY (face_id) );
